text: This is one of the stations along North East Line (NEL) that does not connect to an overt shopping mall.

Never really a big fan of large crowded MRT stations. Personally was quite lost the moment I exited the station, as there were 3 to 4 large exits with long walks, presumably leading me to different parts of Serangoon, Balestier, and Boon Keng, upon exit. Without proper signages and directions, it's just very difficult to find anything if you're here the first couple of times. Exited one of them accidentally, and had to go back down to find the right exits.

How do I relate to Boon keng mrt. Take me to Boon Keng. I, Sylvia Ang, known as Lay Kheng Ang. There is 4 stops. Serangoon, Woodleigh, potong Pasir, Boon keng. The closer MRT is woodleigh there is food republic,  NTUC finest, optician, key/locksmith. Four station to kallang polyclinic, to dignity kitchen. I love you Boon Keng. Give you a 5.You can ride me to little lindia. Where Muthu curry fish head. Where eat & mingle. There is culture integration. Location 900 Serangoon Road S32826

A north-east line station locates in the middle of a residential area. Hidden gem for local food and artitechture. Just few steps from the station, you can easily find a fresh market where local food and fresh ingredients are sold. Two stations away from little india and downtown area.
